Qlik Platform specialization highly desired. Expert understanding and experience with BI technology, data governance, and program adoption. Experienced with Salesforce.com development, administration, and maintenance. Proficiency with Microsoft Office including Excel, Word, and PowerPoint. Keen project management skills with an ability to lead cross-functional teams to succeed on multiple fronts simultaneously. Effective verbal and written communication on all levels, both internally and externally. Self-motivated, analytical, quick learner, organized, detail-oriented, and multi-tasker. Prioritizes workload and meets deadlines for a variety of "deliverables". Demonstrates initiative with a results orientation, while exhibiting strong drive and leadership skills. Strong problem solving and troubleshooting skills with the ability to exercise mature judgment. Experience with sales and marketing analytics including data processing, model building, statistical analysis, a/b testing, and customer segmentation.
